languages.text: "...жертвы. Все больше жертв, каждую минуту..." {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас потемневшими глазами, которые на фоне белого лица выглядят черными.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. Чрево этой проклятой машины — там, на нижних уровнях. Дополнительный исчислитель управляет системой подачи раскаленных отходов под основным корпусом мануфакторума. Этот когитатор движим энергией тысяч людей, которых прямо сейчас заливает раскаленным шлаком под нашими ногами".

traits.locale_text: "...жертвы. Все больше жертв, каждую минуту..." {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас потемневшими глазами, которые на фоне белого как мел лица выглядят черными.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. Чрево этой проклятой машины — там, на нижних уровнях. Дополнительный исчислитель управляет системой подачи раскаленных отходов под основным корпусом мануфакторума. Этот когитатор движим энергией тысяч людей, которых прямо сейчас заливает раскаленным шлаком под нашими ногами".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."
languages.original_text: "...жертвы. Все больше жертв, каждую минуту..." {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас потемневшими глазами, которые на фоне белого лица выглядят черными.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. Чрево этой проклятой машины — там, на нижних уровнях. Дополнительный исчислитель управляет системой подачи раскаленных отходов под основным корпусом мануфакторума. Этот когитатор движим энергией тысяч людей, которых прямо сейчас заливает раскаленным шлаком под нашими ногами".

The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “……是献祭，每分钟都有越来越多的人遭到献祭……”{n}海因里希看着你，他的双眼变得更加阴沉。在白色的皮肤衬托之下，仿佛变成了脸上的两颗黑洞。{/n}“这些数据都是火祭的行列式。这台被诅咒的机器，它的子宫藏在下层，它的辅助计数器控制着这座制造工厂下方用来传送熔炼废渣的系统。这台沉思者的能量，来自从成千上万的活人身上榨取的能量。就在我们说话的这一会儿，那些人都被熔炼成了渣滓，在我们脚下流淌。”
languages.original_text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

traits.locale_text: “……是献祭，每分钟都有越来越多的人遭到献祭……”{n}海因里希看着你，他的双眼变得更加阴沉。在白色的皮肤衬托之下，仿佛变成了脸上的两颗黑洞。{/n}“这些数据都是火祭的行列式。这台被诅咒的机器，它的子宫藏在下层，它的辅助计数器控制着这座制造工厂下方用来传送熔炼废渣的系统。这台思考器的能量，来自从成千上万的活人身上榨取的能量。就在我们说话的这一会儿，那些人都被熔炼成了渣滓，在我们脚下流淌。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «... sacrificios. Más sacrificios a cada momento...». {n}Heinrix te mira con unos ojos más oscuros que antes, casi negros en su rostro pálido.{/n} «Hecatombe determinans. El útero de esta máquina maldita se encuentra en los niveles inferiores. El enumerador auxiliar controla el sistema que envía desechos derretidos al edificio principal del manufactorum. Lo que alimenta a este cogitador es la energía obtenida de miles de personas... que fluyen bajo nuestros pies como desechos metálicos en este mismo instante».
languages.original_text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

traits.locale_text: «... sacrificios. Más sacrificios a cada momento...». {n}Heinrix te mira con unos ojos más oscuros que antes, casi negros en su rostro pálido.{/n} «Hecatombe determinans. El útero de esta máquina maldita se encuentra en los niveles inferiores. El enumerador auxiliar controla el sistema que envía desechos derretidos al edificio principal del manufactorum. Lo que alimenta a este cogitador es la energía obtenida de miles de personas... que fluyen bajo nuestros pies como desechos metálicos en este mismo instante».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「…犠牲が。刻一刻と犠牲が増えていく…」{n}ハインリックスはあなたを見つめる。その目は今、白い顔においてはより一層黒く見えた。{/n}「ヘカトン決定因子。この呪われた機械のはらわたは下層にあるようです。この補助列挙装置は、溶融廃棄物を聖工場本部の下に送り込むシステムを制御しています。この考算機は、何千人もの人々から利用されたエネルギーによって燃料を供給されています…彼らは今こうしている間にも、溶融廃棄物として我々の足元を流れているのです」
languages.original_text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

traits.locale_text: 「…犠牲が。刻一刻と犠牲が増えていく…」{n}ハインリックスはあなたを見つめる。その目は今、白い顔においてはより一層黒く見えた。{/n}「ヘカトン決定因子。この呪われた機械のはらわたは下層にあるようです。この補助列挙装置は、溶融廃棄物を聖工場本部の下に送り込むシステムを制御しています。この考算機は、何千人もの人々から利用されたエネルギーによって燃料を供給されています…彼らは今こうしている間にも、溶融廃棄物として我々の足元を流れているのです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "... Opfer. Jede Minute mehr und mehr Opfer ..." {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, seine Augen sind jetzt dunkler, fast schwarz in seinem weißen Gesicht.{/n} "Hekatombe determinans. Die Gebärmutter dieser verfluchten Maschine befindet sich auf den unteren Ebenen. Der Hilfszähler kontrolliert das System zur Lieferung von eingeschmolzenem Müll unter dem Hauptgebäude des Manufactorums. Dieser Cogitator wird mit der Energie von Tausenden von Menschen betrieben – die in diesem Moment als Schlacke unteren unseren Füßen dahinfließen."
languages.original_text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

traits.locale_text: "... Opfer. Jede Minute mehr und mehr Opfer ..." {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, seine Augen sind jetzt dunkler, fast schwarz in seinem weißen Gesicht.{/n} "Hekatombe determinans. Die Gebärmutter dieser verfluchten Maschine befindet sich auf den unteren Ebenen. Der Hilfszähler kontrolliert das System zur Lieferung von eingeschmolzenem Müll unter dem Hauptgebäude des Manufactorums. Dieser Cogitator wird mit der Energie von Tausenden von Menschen betrieben – die in diesem Moment als Schlacke unteren unseren Füßen dahinfließen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « ... sacrifices. Des sacrifices plus nombreux à chaque minute qui passe... » {n}Quand Heinrix se tourne vers vous, ses yeux sont plus sombres, à tel point qu'ils paraissent presque noirs sur son visage pâle.{/n} « Hecatombe determinans. Le ventre de cette machine maudite se trouve dans les niveaux inférieurs. L'énumérateur auxiliaire contrôle le système de transport des déchets fondus sous le bâtiment principal du manufactorum. Ce cogitateur est alimenté par l'énergie produite à partir de milliers de gens qui circulent sous nos pieds en ce moment même sous forme de scories. »
languages.original_text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

traits.locale_text: « ... sacrifices. Des sacrifices plus nombreux à chaque minute qui passe... » {n}Quand Heinrix se tourne vers vous, ses yeux sont plus sombres, à tel point qu'ils paraissent presque noirs sur son visage pâle.{/n} « Hecatombe determinans. Le ventre de cette machine maudite se trouve dans les niveaux inférieurs. L'énumérateur auxiliaire contrôle le système de transport des déchets fondus sous le bâtiment principal du manufactorum. Ce cogitateur est alimenté par l'énergie produite à partir de milliers de gens qui circulent sous nos pieds en ce moment même sous forme de scories. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kurbanlar. Sayıları anbean artıyor..." {n}Heinrix, beyaz yüzünde koyulaşıp neredeyse simsiyah olan gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. Bu melun makinenin rahmi, alt katlarda. Yedek sayacı, manufaktorum ana binasının altındaki erimiş atıkları taşımak için kullanılan sistemi kontrol ediyor. Bu kavramsayarın gücü, şu anda üzerinde bulunduğumuz zeminin altında akıp giden bir cürufa dönüşmüş, binlerce insandan geliyor."
languages.original_text: "...sacrifices. More and more sacrifices every minute..." {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes darker now, appearing almost black in his white face.{/n} "Hecatombe determinans. The womb of this cursed machine is down on the lower levels. The auxiliary enumerator controls the system for delivering molten waste under the manufactorum's main building. This cogitator is fueled by the energy harnessed from thousands of people — who are flowing beneath our feet as slag waste as we speak."

traits.locale_text: “...Kurbanlar. Sayısı anbean artan kurbanlar...” {n}Heinrix, koyulaşarak beyaz yüzünde neredeyse siyah görünen gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} “Hecatombe determinans. Bu melun makinenin rahmi, alt katlarda. Yedek sayacı, manufaktorum ana binasının altındaki erimiş atıkları taşımak için kullanılan sistemi kontrol ediyor. Bu kavramsayarın gücü, şu anda üzerinde bulunduğumuz zeminin altında akıp giden bir cürufa dönüşmüş binlerce insandan geliyor.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
